name: legendary
description: Dabbling with promises. Itâ€™ll be legendary
readme: # Legendary Legendary is a [Promises/A+](http://promises-aplus.github.com/promises-spec) compatible promise implementation. It combines promise subclassing with sugar inspired by [when.js](https://github.com/cujojs/when), [Q](https://github.com/kriskowal/q) and [async](https://github.com/caolan/async). ## Theme song [Legendary](https://soundcloud.com/buck65/legendary) by [Buck 65](http://buck65.com).
